briefTitle: Radiofrequency Chip for Localization of Non-Palpable Breast Lesions
officialTitle: Use of a Radiofrequency Chip for Localization of Non-Palpable Breast Lesions: A Comparison to Wire Localization
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of Participants With Successful Localization
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women requiring image guided pre-operative breast tumor localization

Exclusion Criteria:

* Tumors deeper than 6 cm from the skin surface
* More than one tumor requiring localization
* Tumors requiring bracketing
* Tumors requiring Magnetic Resonance Imaging localization
* Inability to complete survey
* Pregnancy
